mapper.insert: insert into tbl_goods (gdsName, gdsAuthor, category, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate) values (#{gdsName}, #{gdsAuthor}, #{category}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes}, #{gdsImg}, now())
mapper.select: select * from tbl_goods order by gdsNum desc, gdsDate desc
mapper.update: update tbl_goods set gdsName = #{gdsName}, gdsAuthor = #{gdsAuthor}, category = #{category}, gdsPrice = #{gdsPrice}, gdsStock = #{gdsStock}, gdsDes = #{gdsDes} where gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
